name: Toast With Refried Beans and Avocado
description: Tasty, filling, but not overly heavy, this is ideal breakfast fare for those who want something beside the bacon and eggs.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup homemade or store-bought vegan refried beans
Coarse sea salt such as Maldon or fleur de sel

recipeInstructions.text: Toast bread to desired level of doneness. Top with refried beans and avocado (mash with a fork if desired). Add slivered onions, sprinkle with salt, and serve.
